Help.Description:
Does the same thing as #substitute {message} {.} and adds the message to your substitution list.
A gagged message will no longer be displayed.
Help.Example:
If Twinkie is an annoying person, he'll be a gagged annoying person with this gag.
The %i at the start makes the gag case incensitive, so if Twinkie logs in as TWINKIE the gag will still work.
